extendedInfo.description: May require a rooted phone (depends on phone)Take a screenshot of your phone's screen, save as a jpg or png file, and share anywhere!- Crop screenshots- Draw and annotate screenshots- Screen shot status bar button- Screenshot widget button- Shake to screen shot- Delayed screenshot timer- "Share" menu integration- Custom save directory- Overlay phone information on screenshot- Works on ALL rooted devices, including Honeycomb!NOTE: If this version does not work, please download "No Root Screenshot It", which will work on your phone (also available on the Android market). NOTE: To remove superuser permission toast message from your screenshots, goto your "superuser permissions" app and disable toast messages.Tags: Screenshot screen shot capture

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Really easy to use on my android tablet. The Share option is useful and links nicely with Spring pad.
reviews.author: Flayne J

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great screenshot app easy to use. Definitely worth the money.
reviews.author: Adam Langley

reviews.title: The new update sucks
reviews.comment: I was the biggest fan of this app until the update. It was a wonderful app for unrooted phones, now its garbage. I am utterly disgusted that you now HAVE to root
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use and excellent result
reviews.comment: I tried the trial version n it end up well. Very easy to install and use. So I purchased full version. Never regret for paying small amount on it!
reviews.author: Opec Rahman

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Love this app, easy to use.love it love it
reviews.author: karen davis

reviews.title: Five star app
reviews.comment: Great app that does what it says really well.  couple of suggestions for the developer: :: 1 - If you have it pinned to the status bar the first time you click take screenshot it wont work (this is on a nexus 7 and is repeatable ) :: 2 - Can you make the file name preset adjustable  ( i want YYYY-MM-DD- as the default - not the full timestamp) :: 3 - Can you add a count down like some other apps :: 4 - Can you make share an after shot action (like edit and preview) :: 5 - Can you make a app icon and widget that takes the screenshot (using the defaults) straight away (so you don\'t have to go into the app and press take screenshot)
reviews.author: Justin Kelly

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: It\'s either too sensitive or u have to beat ur phone for it to work. If u choose to have the button on ur taskbar, it only  works when it wants. But when it DOES work,  its great.
reviews.author: Erika Dupree

reviews.title: Super Cool!
reviews.comment: I paid 5 bucks for this app.... downloaded others before but they didn\'t work.... This one works just fine... it\'s worth it.
reviews.author: Frank Juarez

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Tried many apps 4 the new motorola touchscreen phone and they didn\'t work, would recommend this for a tablet.:)
reviews.author: mary cato

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Never had any big problems except now every screen shot i take as the message \"a screen shot will be taken in 5 seconds\"  dead center in the middle of the pic.. Droid rezound. Please fix! (:
reviews.author: Briana Angus

reviews.title: Samsung s3
reviews.comment: can take screenshots, but how do I use your app now that the search button is gone? i like the crop feature best thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work for my LG Optimus Regard but 99% onf Android phones come with built-in screenshot. Volume down + power.
reviews.author: Mike Shuman

reviews.title: Works a treat!
reviews.comment: Great quality app with nice little tutorial, and lots of options. Worth the money. Works on my rooted Star B92M :-)
reviews.author: Paul Littlefield

reviews.title: Hell yeah
reviews.comment: This is so quick and easy to use if u tried the free app buy it now
reviews.author: dominic-phoenix McAlinden

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Awesome application. Every now and then ill have to take the screenshot twice but that\'s once out of every 50
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Better than the stock screenshot app because you can crop and write on the pic before saving or sending it.
reviews.author: Karen Lane

reviews.title: its cool....
reviews.comment: Use whenever you need to! Works GREAT for me....it stays on my droid phone. Yes, I have a droid phone...I\'m living in the past,huh? Kiss my boot straps!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: My phone doesn\'t have the ability to take screen shots like a lot of the other smartphones so this app is great. I love being able to just shake the phone to capture an image. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Kat Mayall

reviews.title: Screenshots
reviews.comment: need no tweaking at all. Perfect pictures. Good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works every time. No errors yet on my rooted Motorola Triumph.
reviews.author: Ryan Lauderdale
